activities: In furtherance of the regulatory and legal requirements of financial institutions, and specifically in reliance upon section 314(b) of the USA PATRIOT Act, to detect and report terror financing, money laundering and other suspicious transactions and persons, a private network of anti-money laundering compliance officers upload to the Blackguard system, the name, image, details and notes regarding suspicious activities and suspicious persons in order to search for matches of images from other subscribers as a method to share information and provide more timely and more complete SARs, STRs, and referrals to law enforcement while at the same time enhancing compliance initiatives.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
